SQL.statement: create distinct type TYPE2 as INTEGER with comparisons
create tablespace TBS1
create table T1(id TYPE2 not null primary key, no TYPE2 not null, name varchar(20)) ORGANIZE BY COLUMN in TBS1
create table T2(id TYPE2 not null primary key, no TYPE2 not null, name varchar(20)) ORGANIZE BY ROW in TBS1
create table T3(id TYPE2 not null primary key, no TYPE2 not null, name varchar(20)) in TBS1
create table T4(id TYPE2 not null primary key, no TYPE2 not null, name varchar(20)) ORGANIZE BY INSERT TIME in TBS1
CREATE INDEX INX1 ON T4(no)
insert into T1 values (10,100,'ORGANIZE BY COLUMN 1')
insert into T1 values (20,200,'ORGANIZE BY COLUMN 2')
insert into T1 values (30,300,'ORGANIZE BY COLUMN 3')
insert into T2 values (10,100,'ORGANIZE BY ROW 1')
insert into T2 values (20,200,'ORGANIZE BY ROW 2')
insert into T2 values (30,300,'ORGANIZE BY ROW 3')
insert into T3 values (1,100,'SIMPLE 1')
insert into T3 values (2,200,'SIMPLE 2')
insert into T3 values (3,300,'SIMPLE 3')
insert into T4 values (10,110,'BY INSERT TIME 1')
insert into T4 values (20,210,'BY INSERT TIME 2')
insert into T4 values (30,310,'BY INSERT TIME 3')
insert into T4 values (40,120,'BY INSERT TIME 4')
insert into T4 values (50,220,'BY INSERT TIME 5')
insert into T4 values (60,320,'BY INSERT TIME 6')
insert into T4 values (70,130,'BY INSERT TIME 6')
insert into T4 values (80,230,'BY INSERT TIME 7')
insert into T4 values (90,330,'BY INSERT TIME 8')
